## ThirdwebSDK.getNFTModule() method

Get an instance of a NFT Collection module

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getNFTModule(address: string): TokenErc721Module;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  address | string | the address of the deployed module |

<b>Returns:</b>

TokenErc721Module

the module
